long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ai test Assistant
Ask Her AI Text Assistant - Your Intelligent Reading Companion

Transform how you interact with web content using Ask Her AI Text Assistant. This intuitive Chrome extension brings AI-powered assistance right to your fingertips.

Key Features:
• Instant Access: Simply highlight any text on a webpage to see the "Ask Her" button appear
• Seamless Integration: Get AI assistance without leaving your current webpage
• User-Friendly Interface: Clean, floating chat window for easy interaction
• Secure & Private: Your data is handled with industry-standard security practices

How It Works:
1. Highlight any text you want to understand or learn more about
2. Click the "Ask Her" button that appears
3. Get instant AI-powered explanations and insights through the chat interface

Perfect for:
• Students researching complex topics
• Professionals analyzing content
• Anyone seeking quick explanations of text they're reading

Start enhancing your web browsing experience with intelligent AI assistance just a highlight away!

Note: Free trial includes 3 chat exchanges per session. Sign in required for usage.
